note: Left Twitter for good. Was TomP there from 4/2019 and at Daily Kos from 10/2006 through around 1/2020. Leftist politics, St. Louis sports fan. Undergrad degree in history with focus on African history. Lawyer. Went to first anti war demonstration in 1969 when I was in 9th grade. Supported and voted for Bernie in 2016 and 2020 primaries, voted for Hillary in 2016 general and Biden in 2020 general election. Generally support Popular Front anti-fascist coalition. I like AOC and the squad.
